page.title: 10Eppleby Playgroup CP
page.content: Eppleby Playgroup started in{1973.}It is on Tuesday and Thursday mornings in the Village Hall.{Mrs Eileen Smith} is in charge of it. Sometimes children's parents help as well as the one helper.{Thirteen children}attend it. There are four children aged 4 and nine children aged 3. The children come from Manfield, Caldwell, Melsonby and Eppleby. Some of the{things they do}there are painting,sticking,sand,water-play, dough-modelling, lego, home-corner, nature-table, and rhymes and dancing. They have a few fund-raising events which are Domino Drives and Easter and Christmas fayres. They sometimes have a sports day on the green. Some old people go there and have a cup of tea while Playgroup is on. They sometimes have outings to places like Whitby and Flamingoland.
